```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr); library(corrplot)
# citation("dplyr"); citation("corrplot")

n2 <- read.table("data/n2-pXRF.txt")
z2 <- read.table("data/z2-pXRF.txt")

n2$Sample <- factor(n2$Sample)
z2$Sample <- factor(z2$Sample)

glimpse(n2)
glimpse(z2)

cor(n2) %>% corrplot (type = "lower", tl.cex = 0.7, tl.pos="d", cl.pos="r")

pca_n2 <- prcomp(n2)

```
